title: Palak Paneer
description: A creamy spinach curry with Indian cottage cheese (paneer) cooked in aromatic spices.
ingredients: Ground Spices (such as turmeric, cumin, coriander, garam masala)
instructions: Blanch spinach leaves in boiling water for 2 minutes. Drain, cool, and blend into a smooth puree.
Heat ghee or oil in a pan, sauté onions until golden brown.
Add ginger, garlic, and green chilies, cook until fragrant.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add ground spices and sauté for a minute.
Add spinach puree and cook for 5-7 minutes.
Add paneer cubes and cream or cashew paste, simmer for another 2-3 minutes.
Garnish with cream or chopped cilantro, and serve hot with naan or rice.

title: Chana Masala
description: A spicy and tangy chickpea curry cooked with onions, tomatoes, and aromatic spices.
ingredients: Ground Spices (such as turmeric, cumin, coriander, garam masala)
Tamarind Paste or Amchur (Dried Mango Powder)
instructions: Soak chickpeas overnight or use canned chickpeas.
Heat ghee or oil in a pan, sauté onions until golden brown.
Add ginger, garlic, and green chilies, cook until fragrant.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add ground spices and sauté for a minute.
Add chickpeas, tamarind paste or amchur, and water, bring to a boil.
Simmer for 15-20 minutes until chickpeas are tender and the curry thickens.
Garnish with chopped cilantro, and serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Aloo Gobi
description: A classic North Indian dish made with potatoes and cauliflower cooked with spices.
ingredients: Ground Spices (such as turmeric, cumin, coriander, garam masala)
instructions: Cut potatoes and cauliflower into bite-sized florets.
Heat ghee or oil in a pan, sauté onions until golden brown.
Add ginger, garlic, and green chilies, cook until fragrant.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add ground spices and sauté for a minute.
Add potatoes and cauliflower, toss well to coat with spices.
Cover and cook on low heat until vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally.
Garnish with chopped cilantro, and serve hot with roti or rice.
